bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:55 AM.  Morning recess is from 11 to 11:20 and lunch is 12:35 to 1:15. For kindergarten to 3rd grade, school ends at 2:55 PM.  For 4th and 5th grader school ends at 3:25 PM.
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early release. School starts at 8:55 AM.  Recess is from 11 to 11:20 and lunch is 12:35 to 1:15. School ends at 2:25 PM.
bell_schedule.3: School starts at 9 AM, Recess is at 11 to 11:20 AM, Lunch is 12:20 pm to 1 pm. Dismissal for K-3 is 3 PM. Dismissal for 4-5 is 3:30 PM
bell_schedule.4: School starts at 8:55 AM.  Recess is from 11 to 11:20 and lunch is 12:35 to 1:15. For kindergarten to 3rd grade, school ends at 2:55 PM.  For 4th and 5th grader school ends at 3:25 PM.

end_time.1: For kindergarten to 3rd grade, school ends at 2:55 PM.  For 4th and 5th grader school ends at 3:25 PM.
end_time.2: Tuesday is early release. School ends at 2:25 PM.
end_time.3: For kindergarten to 3rd grade, school ends at 2:55 PM.  For 4th and 5th grader school ends at 3:25 PM.
